summary: Eira is a fierce Nord warrior whom you can take with you to adventure Skyrim as a follower. She is also a marriage candidate.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img823/8812/screenshoteira.jpg[/img] 

[heading]-Description-[/heading] 

[line]

Eira is a two-handed Nord follower. You can find her in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

If you enjoy this mod, please come back and endorse!! Endorsements make us all warm n fuzzy and feel validated in the world!! 

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/5167/screenshot76792.jpg[/img]

This mod is Standalone! But to make it look more like the screenshots, I would recommend,

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899/] UNP Blessed Body (My favourite!) - Calyps [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554/] Navetsea\'s CBBE Skin Texture (Unp) [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946/] Sporty Sexy Sweat - xs2reality [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909/] aMidianBorn Book of Silence - CaBal120 [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26770/] aMidianBorn Hide Armour - CaBal120 [/url]
- And ENB will help as well.

[line]

[heading]-UPDATE-[/heading]

1.1- Added Spells, Perks, and Auto-level. (WIP)

[line]

[heading]-Details-[/heading]

Auto level? - I believe so.
Inventory? - Hide Bracers, Hide Shield.
Default Armour? - Hide Armour.
Marriage Candidate? - Yes, able and willing.
U.F.O Compatible? - Yes.
Essential? - Yes, Eira is essential.

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/2750/screenshot23439.jpg[/img]

 [line]

[heading]-Credits & MANY Thanks To-[/heading]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/] ApachiiSkyHair By Apachii [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812] Better Females By Bella  [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113/] Better Females Natural Edition By Zzjay [/url]
- Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2651356] GR00VYGH0ULIE [/url] for help, support and playtesting!!
author: Lizzy Angelica
